description: Easy little trail in the historic town of Greenwood.   A very interesting looking town and a nice walk after dinner.  It can be made as long or short as desired as it connects up to the TransCanadaTrail (Trail to 2010), Columbia & Western Railway, et al.
directions:
At the South end of Greenwood, look for the old brick powerhouse.  Park near to it and the trail starts just behind it.

Greenwood is on Hiway 3 (Crowsnest)between Grand Forks & Osoyoos.
title: Boundry Creek Nature Walk
